img_text: history write's our story It will speak about a man and his unwavering love for erica and her people. A true patriot o refused to stand outside the fire nd watch his Country and all it stands for be destroyed History will also remember the brave American's who joined him in his fight against a corrupt President, his failed Government and a biased News Media Not since the American Revolution, have so many from all walks of life come together in support of one tough and brave American. TM R U For the People By the Paple
